 = HEOS: All you need for learning English.  =

With HEOS you can Improve your English  reading, writing and listening and it is all free!

A new approach to learning English

‘Hello English’ is designed for schools, students and teachers.

*** For students For students:  HEOS has activities for adults and kids: there are flash interactive games, java games, podcasts, videos with scripts and software for vocabulary trainers, text trainers, speech software and so on.

*** For teachers: HEOS has several software applications for teachers. You can create activities for your students like crosswords, quizzes and so on and afterwards you can send the activities to your student users or post them on your blog in order to use them online.  Also you have within HEOS a Europack  which is a  teacher’s resource designed to teach European history. There are  a lot of ideas and activities for your English classes. This section offers a set of thirteen lesson plans which enable the teacher to introduce different aspects of Europe to their students.

*** For  School HEOS has a didactical tool for teachers. It lets you view and control other computers in your network in several ways. It supports Linux and Windows 2000/XP.For schools & teachers. You have the best software in order to create personalized activities and the software for the students to take control of theirs computers in class.

You can use HEOS in LiveDVD mode so you do not need to install anything on your computer.
Also you can install HEOS on your computer or store it on a pendrive/ flash pen at the same time using Windows XP or Windows 7 and afterwards you can un-install it like any windows application.

Thanks to Language Learning Worldwide for their support for this web.
